conversation.content: I want a login system with email and password

chat.response: The requested feature is a login system that allows users to log in using their email addresses and passwords.

questions.question: Does the login system require users to create an account upon first use?
Should the system include password recovery functionality?
Are there any specific security requirements for the login system, such as two-factor authentication or captcha?

feature_overview.description: The email and password login system allows users to securely access their accounts by providing a valid email address and password. The system ensures user data privacy by encrypting the password for safe storage.
acceptance_criteria: A user can enter a valid email address and password combination to log in successfully.
If a user enters incorrect credentials, an error message is displayed without revealing the actual password.
After successful login, the user is redirected to their dashboard or homepage.
The system automatically logs out users after a specified period of inactivity.

questions.question: Does the login system require users to create an account upon first use?
Should the system include password recovery functionality?

feature_overview.description: The email and password login system allows users to securely access their accounts by providing a valid email address and password. The system ensures user data privacy by encrypting the password for safe storage.

After successful login, the user is redirected to their dashboard or homepage.
The system automatically logs out users after a specified period of inactivity.
Additional information (such as phone number or date of birth) may be required during registration if requested by the system.
Two-factor authentication and captcha are optional but can be implemented for enhanced security.

conversation.content: i want to create a simple welcome page for a new section on my web named "Members Only"

questions.question: What specific content should be included in the welcome message?
Will there be any navigation options within this Members Only section on the welcome page?
Are there any design or style specifications that need to be followed for this welcome page?

feature_overview.description: This feature includes a welcome page for the new "Members Only" section of the web application. The page will provide an introduction and necessary information to users about this members-only area.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The welcome message is displayed prominently on the page.
2. Navigation options within the Members Only section are available on the welcome page, if applicable.
3. The design and style of the welcome page match the overall look and feel of the rest of the web application.
4. The page is accessible to registered members only.
